verbose_text: We particularly focused on the use of elastography, as several studies have found that low elasticity of the lesion is related with a higher incidence of malignancy [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR], though it is also related with other histological features, such as the presence of fibrosis and the expression of galectin-3 and fibronectin-1 [XREF_BIBR].
